sn36.26:1.1: Atha kho sambahula bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankamimsu; upasankamitva …pe… ekamantam nisinna kho te bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavocum:
sn36.26:1.2: “katama nu kho, bhante, vedana, katamo vedanasamudayo, katama vedanasamudayagamini patipada?
sn36.26:1.4: Ko vedanaya assado, ko adinavo, kim nissaranan”ti?
sn36.26:1.6: sukha vedana, dukkha vedana, adukkhamasukha vedana.
sn36.26:1.11: yo vedanaya chandaragavinayo chandaragappahanam. Idam vedanaya nissaranan”ti.
